QuestData.Title: A Harvester Has Come
QuestData.Description: This is what happens when one stands in the path of a genesaur. And where a genesaur walks, the botani follow.$b$bI saw one entering our shelter cave along the northern side of the camp.$b$bIt is commanding the podlings to gather the corpses of our fallen brethren and must be stopped.$b$bI must tend to our wounded, and gather supplies for our departure.$b$bIf you are serious about being a hero, venture into the cave and slay this botani.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He is a weapon of the genesaur, Iyu.
QuestData.RewardText: I dread to think what the botani had intended to do with the corpses of our fallen.
